hero.title: Advanced Fraud Protection
hero.subtitle: Our multi-layered system analyzes every transaction in real-time to protect your business and your customers from threats.

device.title: Device Fingerprinting
device.description: We uniquely identify each device to detect suspicious connections, compromised devices, and spoofing attempts.

behavioral.title: Behavioral Biometrics
behavioral.description: Our AI analyzes how a user interacts with the page (typing speed, mouse movements) to distinguish a human from a bot.

velocity.title: Velocity Checks
velocity.description: We monitor the frequency, geolocation, and amount of transactions to spot abnormal patterns and impossible travel.

risk.title: Dynamic Risk Scoring
risk.description: Each transaction receives a confidence score based on hundreds of signals. High-risk transactions are automatically blocked, while legitimate ones are approved without friction.

behavioral.title: Behavioral Analysis
behavioral.description: By comparing user behavior to known patterns, we can identify suspicious activities that traditional systems miss. Bots and fraudsters have distinct behavioral signatures.
